name: title
description: Title of the artwork or artifact

name: artist
description: Creator or artist of the artifact

name: year
description: Year or date the artifact was created

name: period
description: Artistic period or era (e.g., Renaissance, Baroque)

name: image_url
description: URL to the image of the artifact

name: full_details
description: Extended or detailed information about the artifact

name: room_name
description: The museum room or location where the artifact is displayed
